1.content:

15533.title: Yes, let's fatten one of Taylor's Rivals

info.brief_description: Taylor Swift and her Girl Squad Friends start packing on the pounds
info.description:
This is a weight gain story where Taylor Swift and her Girl Squad Friends start putting on weight and deal with the consquences.

Here are are a few rules.

1. No Male Weight Gain.

2. No Killing of Characters.

3. No Vore.

4. Keep the weight gain slow and realistic. No gaining 1000 pounds all at once.
info.pretty_title: Taylor Swift and Girl Squad Weight Gain
